descriptionHtml:
Simply hides sheathed weapons from your character's back/hip.
This mod replaces Skyrim's VANILLA MALE skeletons.

[color=#ff0000][size=4][i][b]>>[/b][/i][/size][/color]T[i]his mod contains nif-files, so backup your [u]current skeleton files[/u] before overwriting them with these[/i]![color=#ff0000][size=4][b]<<[/b][/size][/color]
BACKUP folder contains unmodified files for VANILLA skeletons.

Same mod, but for female characters:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48469/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48469/?[/url]
author: Miksusc
